word:
"Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap." The harvest is sure. No frost shall blight it, no palmerworm destroy it. The truth rejected becomes a savor of death unto death. Every hour spent in careless inaction, in indifference to God's claims, is an 


                                  -142- 

hour lost forever. Every opportunity allowed to pass unimproved means an eternal loss.
